translation.en: Hold all my calls.
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
Girls, it's time.
Dad, no.
I have to keep feeding the Christmas Panda or the Panda will die.
translation.de: Ich muss den Weihnachtspanda füttern, sonst stirbt er.

translation.en: [gasps] His death is on your conscience. I hope bedtime was worth it.
translation.de: Ich muss den Weihnachtspanda füttern, sonst stirbt er. Du bist schuld, wenn er stirbt. Ich hoffe, die Bettzeit war's wert.

translation.en: Who said bedtime?
It's time for the grand finale of Templeton Christmas Traditions.
translation.de: Zeit für das Finale der Templeton-Weihnachtstraditionen.

translation.en: Dad tells a holiday-themed story until you fall asleep. Whoo!
Do we have to? I'm in the middle of something.
Christmas, Christmas, Christmas-- Hey.
Why do we have to do something just because it's a tradition?
translation.de: Wieso müssen wir was tun, nur weil es Tradition ist?

translation.en: I know someone who felt the same way you did.
translation.de: Ich kenne einen, der sich das auch fragte.

translation.en: Who? Do I know them? Do they have a beard?
translation.de: Kenne ich ihn? Hat er einen Bart?

translation.en: Or a curse that makes them sing?
It was actually your Uncle Ted.
And once upon a time...
Sneaky story intro.
When he was a baby, he hated our Christmas traditions,
translation.de: Als Baby hasste er unsere Weihnachtstraditionen,

translation.en: even though they were the most awesome traditions ever.
translation.de: obwohl es die besten Traditionen überhaupt waren.

translation.en: Five days before Christmas, we played...
translation.de: Fünf Tage vor Weihnachten spielten wir…

translation.en: [all] Shock That Elf.
-It's your dad's year to be the elf. -All right.
But me and my elf buddy here are pretty hard to--
translation.de: Aber ich und mein Elf-Kumpel sind…

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -[shouts]
[adult Tim] Four days before Christmas, we'd make cards for our grandparents.
translation.de: Vier Tage vor Weihnachten bastelten wir Karten für unsere Großeltern.

translation.en: A Christmas tree.
A reindeer.
The baby made Santa's sleigh.
translation.de: Das Baby hat Santas Schlitten gemalt.

translation.en: [adult Tim] Three days before Christmas, we'd sing the most soulful bass-and-glockenspiel rendition
translation.de: Drei Tage vor Weihnachten sangen wir die beseelteste Version

translation.en: of "The Night Before Christmas" you've ever heard.
translation.de: von "In der Nacht vor dem Christfest".

translation.en: ♪ 'Twas the night before Christmas And all through the house ♪
translation.de: In der Nacht vor dem Christfest Da regte im Haus

translation.en: ♪ Not a creature was stirring Not even a mouse ♪
translation.de: Sich niemand und Nichts Nicht mal eine Maus

translation.en: [adult Tim] Two days before Uncle Ted's first Christmas,
translation.de: Zwei Tage vor Onkel Teds erstem Weihnachten

translation.en: that's when the magic started.
Work with me, baby.
Aw, there. Our handsome little elf.
Ooh! I'm gonna grab the camera.
I thought Christmas was a day, not a month.
translation.de: Weihnachten ist ein Tag, kein ganzer Monat.

translation.en: You can't contain Templeton traditions to one day.
That's like trying to hold eight ants. Too many ants.
You performed "The Night Before Christmas" three days before.
translation.de: Ihr sangt "In der Nacht vor dem Christfest" drei Tage davor.

translation.en: Performing it on the actual night before Christmas is bad luck.
translation.de: Singt man es an Heiligabend, bringt's Unglück.

translation.en: Uh, you put a gingerbread fellow in my pocket?
translation.de: Wieso steckst du mir Lebkuchen zu?

translation.en: Because it is good luck.
And yet I'm still here,
wearing this.
Where's yours?
Not participating in today's "dress like a court jester" tradition?
translation.de: Machst du nicht bei "Kleide dich wie ein Hofnarr" mit?

translation.en: That's not today's tradition. We--
Who's ready to get their pictures taken with Santa?
translation.de: Wer ist bereit für Fotos mit Santa?

translation.en: I'll be right there with you the whole time.
translation.de: Ich werde die ganze Zeit bei dir sein.

translation.en: We sit on his lap, tell him what we want.
translation.de: Wir setzen uns auf seinen Schoß, sagen unsere Wünsche.

translation.en: It's the easiest and best tradition. You don't have to freak out.
translation.de: Ist die einfachste und beste Tradition von allen. Hab keine Angst.

translation.en: Tim, check this out. A snowball?
I'm gonna throw it in Santa's face.
translation.de: Ich werf ihn Santa ins Gesicht.

translation.en: What? You'll get on the naughty list. Oh, I'm always on the naughty list.
translation.de: -Dann gehörst du zu den Unartigen. -Gehöre ich immer.

translation.en: I don't give old Kringle the power to suppress my animal instincts.
translation.de: Ich lass den Alten nicht meine Instinkte unterdrücken.

translation.en: But only good kids get presents.
Do only they?
Naughty-listers get the greatest present of all, coal.
The black rock with a million uses.
translation.de: Damit kann man so viel machen.

translation.en: Heat, decoration, other. It's a win-win.
Want me to split this in two? We can totally flank Santa.
translation.de: Soll ich den halbieren? So können wir beide werfen.

translation.en: No, I work hard to stay on the nice list.
Who do you think gave them quarters for massages?
translation.de: Wer, denkst du, zahlte die Massage?

translation.en: Suit yourself.
We should probably get up.
I've been trying to.
Come on up.
Timothy Templeton. Four T's in it.
This is Theodore. Same last name, one less T.
Um, what is happening?
We used to work together, a long time ago.
translation.de: Wir arbeiteten vor langer Zeit zusammen.

translation.en: Wait, Santa is-- Former Baby Corp.
As disloyal as a cat with trade secrets to sell.
translation.de: Loyal wie eine Katze, die Geheimnisse verkauft.

translation.en: I'm just trying to spread joy and happiness.
Blah, blah, blah. I heard it all the day you quit.
translation.de: Ich erfuhr's am Tag, als du gekündigt hast.

translation.en: When will Mommy and Daddy take a picture?
translation.de: Wann machen Mom und Dad das Foto?

translation.en: -Honey, take a picture. -I'm trying, I'm just so relaxed.
translation.de: -Schatz, mach ein Foto. -Ja, ich bin nur so entspannt.

translation.en: I left Baby Corp because I had this idea
translation.de: Ich kündigte, weil ich eine Idee hatte,

translation.en: of how to make the world a happier place with Christmas cheer.
translation.de: wie man alle mit Weihnachtsstimmung glücklicher macht.

translation.en: Think it's working?
You're doing fine. Don't side with this hippie.
He betrayed everything Baby Corp stands for.
translation.de: Er verriet alles, wofür Baby Corp steht.

translation.en: He poached half the company for his toys-for-nothing program.
translation.de: Er warb so viele für sein Spielzeug-für-Nichts Programm ab.

translation.en: And he's exploiting baby labor to make those toys.
Elves. Elves make the toys.
Oh, come on. That's just marketing.
Whoa, they are babies?
-Okay, say cheese. -Cheese.
Smile for your parents.
I will never be caught smiling with a commie like--
Gotcha.
-[grunting] -I'm on the nice list, right?
translation.de: Ich stehe bei den artigen Kindern, oder?

translation.en: Tippy top.
Yes. For Christmas, I want Football Mike Canadian Football Edition
translation.de: Ich wünsche mir die kanadische Ausgabe von Football Mike

translation.en: with the locker room Jacuzzi playset.
You write that request in official letter form?
Now he loves paperwork.
You know it.
Drop it off with my elves, and have a Merry Christmas.
translation.de: Gib ihn meinen Elfen und frohe Weihnachten.

translation.en: Thanks, Santa. You too, bye.
I see you, Danny Petrosky.
Naughty list life forever.
translation.de: Für immer bei den unartigen Kindern.

translation.en: See? Wasn't that fun, little guy?
Look, Cracklin' Bones O'Dell and the Caroling Cracklettes.
Put me down. I have a score to settle.
You won't do anything to get me on the naughty list?
translation.de: Ich will aber nicht zu den Unartigen gehören.

translation.en: I'm not a monster, Templeton.
Santa Claus is.
So, Ron, you like getting mail?
translation.de: Ron, du bekommst also gerne Post?

translation.en: Well, here's a special delivery.
Not like you to be sleeping on the job on Christmas Eve, Dongle.
translation.de: Ist nicht deine Art an Heiligabend zu schlafen, Dongle.

translation.en: It's Christmas Eve? Where am--? Oh!
You still owe me 300 hollyberries, Dongle. Pay up.
translation.de: Du schuldest mir noch 300 Stachelbeeren. Zahl endlich.

translation.en: Why are you calling me--? Where--?
Oh, no.
Don't play dumb, Dongle. I want my money before Boxing Day. Get it?
translation.de: Stell dich nicht dumm, Dongle. Ich will mein Geld. Kapiert?

translation.en: Do get it. Not Dongle.
Dongle! I'm so jolly to see you.
translation.de: -Kapiert. Nicht Dongle. -Dongle. Ich freu mich so, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: Not Dongle.
What's up with your voice, Dongle? Are you sick?
translation.de: Was ist mit deiner Stimme, Dongle?

translation.en: I'm not Dongle.
Everybody, come quick. Dongle's sick.
translation.de: Kommt alle her. Dongle ist krank.

translation.en: Can you see? Look at me.
I'm not Dongle!
[Tim] It's Christmas Eve.
-You'll love it. -Santa, Dongle is sorry for sleep--
translation.de: -Du wirst es lieben. -Es tut Dongle leid, eingeschlafen…

translation.en: -What did you do with my brother? -What did you do with Santa?
translation.de: -Was ist mit meinem Bruder? -Was ist mit Santa?

translation.en: Oh, no. Are you...?
Dongle's name is Ding Dong Dongle.
translation.de: Dongles Name ist Ding Dong Dongle.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're an elf?
translation.de: Ja, aber du bist ein Elf?

translation.en: Superior toymaker of the North Pole.
When Dongle makes a toy, so many jaws drop to the floor
translation.de: Der Kieferorthopäde kann sich eine neue Villa kaufen

translation.en: that the jaw doctor can buy a new mansion.
translation.de: von all den Kinnladen, die runterfallen.

translation.en: You made a rocking horse from the crib?
translation.de: Bautest du ein Schaukelpferd aus dem Kinderbett?

translation.en: Is it perfect?
Then yes.
Wait, so if you're here, then my brother is...
translation.de: Moment, wenn du hier bist, ist mein Bruder…

translation.en: At the North Pole, of course. Does Dongle look like he is from Texas?
translation.de: Am Nordpol natürlich. Sieht Dongle aus, als käme er aus Texas?

translation.en: Imagine cowboy hat Dongle. Very handsome.
translation.de: Stell dir Dongle mit Cowboyhut vor. Sehr stattlich.

translation.en: So he's with Santa? Aw.
We gotta get him back now.
It's his first Christmas. We have more traditions he has to do.
translation.de: Sein erstes Weihnachten. Wir haben mehr Traditionen.

translation.en: Dongle needs to get back now.
Or the world will be bombarded with inferior toys
that blacken children's hearts.
My brother works at Baby Corp, so all we--
translation.de: Mein Bruder arbeitet bei Baby Corp…

translation.en: Baby Corp. Can't make toys to save their lives.
translation.de: Baby Corp. Die können kein Spielzeug machen.

translation.en: Does that situation come up a lot?
Dongle could tell you stories.
Yes, please. But later.
Baby Corp is our only hope to get out of this.
translation.de: Baby Corp ist unsere einzige Hoffnung.

translation.en: Jimbo, Staci, we have a situation.
translation.de: Jimbo, Staci, wir haben ein Problem.

translation.en: T-W-A-F-E-R.
TWAFER.
"Tommy wants a fire engine, red."
-TWAFER. TWAFER. -[door opens]
Not now, Dongle.
I'm not Dongle, Ron.
Boss Baby? What the jingles are you doing here?
translation.de: Boss Baby? Was machst du denn hier?

translation.en: The question is, how the jingles do I get out of here?
translation.de: Die Frage ist, wie komme ich hier wieder weg?

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing letters.
translation.de: Ich würde ja helfen, aber ich lerne Briefe auswendig.

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.de: Ich würde ja helfen, aber ich lerne Briefe auswendig. Sonst brauche ich Wochen, um die Geschenke auszuliefern.

translation.en: Speaking of jingles, "jingle."
"Judy is now getting lavender earmuffs." J-I-N-G-L-E. JINGLE.
translation.de: "Judy Amann will Ohrenschützer haben, lila." J-A-W-O-H-L.

translation.en: You're an embarrassment to efficiency. Get a computer.
translation.de: Du bist so ineffizient. Hol dir einen Computer.

translation.en: The elves and I are like a family business.
translation.de: Die Elfen und ich sind ein Familienbetrieb.

translation.en: They make the toys, I do this.
These are our family traditions, and they've made everyone happy for a long time.
translation.de: Das sind unsere Familientraditionen, die schon lange alle glücklich machen.

translation.en: Yay for your family. Take me home to mine, Big Beard.
translation.de: Hurra für deine Familie. Bring mich zu meiner.

translation.en: I'm busy. I'll take you tonight when I deliver presents.
translation.de: Ich nehme dich später beim Geschenke-Ausliefern mit.

translation.en: What do I do in the meantime?
Help make a few toys, and maybe learn about the Christmas spirit.
translation.de: Hilf den anderen und lerne was über Weihnachtsstimmung.

translation.en: -Any word on rescuing my brother? -Sorry, ran into a snag.
translation.de: -Könnt ihr meinen Bruder retten? -Ich hab ein Problem.

translation.en: Typical Baby Corp incompetence.
Typical Dongle excellence.
I won that trophy for excellence in trophy modeling. Stop making stuff out of stuff. What's the snag?
translation.de: Mein Pokal für vorzüglichen Pokal-Bau. Hör auf damit. Was für ein Problem?

translation.en: Chupie tech is jammed at the North Pole. Stupid Santa Claus.
Watch your mouth, Baby Corp mongrel.
translation.de: Pass auf, was du sagst, Baby-Corp-Bastard.

translation.en: It's less than 24 hours until my brother's first Christmas.
translation.de: Knapp 24 Stunden bis zum ersten Weihnachten meines Bruders.

translation.en: If we can't chupie there, we have to find another way.
translation.de: Wir müssen uns was anderes einfallen lassen.

translation.en: Mom and Dad will be worried sick.
translation.de: Mom and Dad werden sich Sorgen machen.

translation.en: You relax. Dongle will take care of everything.
translation.de: Ganz ruhig. Dongle kümmert sich um alles.

translation.en: This one's from Aunt Dorothy. "Merry Christmas from Aunt Dorothy."
translation.de: Von Tante Dorothy. "Frohe Weihnachten von Tante Dorothy."

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Is that a grenade?
Don't be foolish. Dongle doesn't explode parents.
translation.de: Quatsch, Dongle jagt keine Eltern in die Luft.

translation.en: Dongle kills with poison gas.
What?
[Mom] Do you smell?
Dongle told a sick joke.
This is Santa's sleeping dust for when the children stay up to see him.
translation.de: Schlafstaub von Santa, wenn Kinder aufbleiben, um ihn zu sehen.

translation.en: What the heck? Drama is the spice of life.
translation.de: -Was zum Teufel? -Drama gibt dem Leben Würze.

translation.en: Should give us time to get to the North Pole and back.
translation.de: Genug Zeit, um es zum Nordpol zu schaffen.

translation.en: But with them asleep,
I have to do the shopping for our traditional fruitcake hockey.
translation.de: muss ich für unser Früchtebrot-Hockey einkaufen.

translation.en: Which we play while wearing Hawaiian leis made from snacks. So fun.
translation.de: Wir tragen hawaiianische Leis aus Snacks. Ist super.

translation.en: Point is, we need to move fast.
No sweat. Santa has magic portals in every mall.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Santa hat in jeder Mall Zaubertore.

translation.en: They appear every night after business hours,
but only until 9 a.m. the day before Christmas.
translation.de: aber nur bis 9 Uhr morgens am Tag vor Weihnachten.

translation.en: We have 20 minutes.
Why didn't you tell us before?
translation.de: Wieso sagst du das erst jetzt?

translation.en: Were you not paying attention when Dongle told you drama is the spice of life?
translation.de: Hast du nicht aufgepasst, als Dongle sagte, Drama sei die Würze des Lebens?

translation.en: So this is where Christmas comes from? You bet.
We got Jingly Jangly there doing wrapping paper design.
translation.de: Dort ist Jingly Jangly, er entwirft Geschenkpapier.

translation.en: Ribbon testing with Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
Okay, okay, that one is good.
[PoopyDoopy] Lala Doo-Da and Diddly Doo write all the best carols.
translation.de: Lala Doo-Da und Diddly Doo komponieren Weihnachtslieder.

translation.en: What kind of nog-house open-mic garbage is that?
translation.de: Was für ein Müll ist denn das?

translation.en: You wouldn't know a hit if it knocked your tooth out.
translation.de: Du hast keine Ahnung von Hits.

translation.en: And of course, toy-making with me, PoopyDoopy, filling in for Dongle.
translation.de: Und natürlich Spielzeug machen mit mir, PoopyDoopy, ich springe für Dongle ein.

translation.en: I admire your skill.
Why thank you.
But I can't help noticing inefficiencies in your systems.
What?
I notice you make all your gingerbread from the eggs of a single goose?
translation.de: Ihr macht all eure Lebkuchen aus den Eiern einer einzigen Gans.

translation.en: That's not just a goose. She's Ginger the Gingergoose.
translation.de: Nicht irgendeiner Gans. Das ist die Lebkuchengans.

translation.en: Sure. And dare I ask a follow-up?
translation.de: Ok. Darf ich noch was fragen?

translation.en: Why have those elves been rubbing gumdrops on the egg for two hours?
translation.de: Wieso reiben diese Elfen Gummibonbons an das Ei.

translation.en: To make it the best gingerbread in the whole world.
translation.de: Damit es die besten Lebkuchen auf der Welt werden.

translation.en: Dubious claim.
Try this.
This is really good. What's the secret?
translation.de: Echt gut. Was ist das Geheimnis?

translation.en: It's made with store-bought chicken eggs and was stuffed in my pocket.
translation.de: Er wurde mit Laden-Eiern gebacken und mir zugesteckt.

translation.en: [all] Delicious.
You guys get it now?
We need to put our gingerbread in your pocket.
translation.de: Wir müssen dir die Lebkuchen zustecken.

translation.en: No, my point is efficiency.
You can't mess up gingerbread. Just crack eggs in some batter.
Why does this goose even have a job, right, Ginger?
translation.de: Wieso hat diese Gans überhaupt einen Job?

translation.en: -[squawks] -What else needs fixing around here?
You're watching paint dry? I thought you were on a deadline.
translation.de: So langsam? Müsst ihr keine Frist einhalten?

translation.en: -We take pride in our wrapping paper. -Just to be torn open?
translation.de: -Wir sind stolz auf unser Geschenkpapier. -Um aufgerissen zu werden?

translation.en: You're wasting time.
But this is the way we've always done things.
translation.de: Aber so haben wir es immer gemacht.

translation.en: Not anymore.
Boom, efficiency. Hit me with another one.
Carol writers, right?
Supposed to be.
But Diddly Doo overdid it on the milk and cookies again.
translation.de: Aber Diddly Doo hat's übertrieben mit Milch und Keksen.

translation.en: Well, excuse me, Mother.
You ever feel like working?
translation.de: Hast du je Lust zu arbeiten?

translation.en: We'll work when I tell you.
If I can make a suggestion-- Oh!
[both] Don't mess with our creative process.
You've got the talent of a wreath.
translation.de: Du hast das Talent eines Kranzes.

translation.en: They're fine. What else you got?
I'm not laughing. Toss it.
Spin me up on this nonsense.
Everyone knows, ribbon is no good if it doesn't tickle me.
translation.de: Geschenkband ist gut, wenn es kitzelt.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Oh, but it is.
No, it's not.
Pretty sure it is.
translation.de: Doch, da bin ich mir sicher.

translation.en: He's a genius.
Could it be, everything we've been doing has been wrong?
translation.de: War denn alles, was wir getan haben, falsch?

translation.en: No telling, but yes. Please, walk with me.
translation.de: -Ich will nichts sagen, aber ja. -Komm mit.

translation.en: [gasps] A walk-and-talk? You're getting the hang of this efficiency thing.
You're telling me.
You've been here an hour, and our productivity is up 20 percent.
translation.de: Dank dir stieg unsere Produktivität um 20 %.

translation.en: We might actually get a nog break before Santa leaves.
Why settle for nog? Imagine what else you could have.
translation.de: Eierlikör-Pausen? Es gibt so viel mehr.

translation.en: Computers for naughty/nice cross-reference.
translation.de: Computer, um artige und unartige Kinder abzuspeichern.

translation.en: Industrial ovens for mass gingerbread baking.
translation.de: Gewerbliche Öfen, um massenweise Lebkuchen zu backen.

translation.en: Break rooms full of gumdrop delights.
And of course, mahogany crafters' lamps.
Yes, to ward off snow monsters.
Mahogany lamps ward off snow monsters?
Mahogany does. Weird, I was just trying to class up the joint.
We should redo this entire floor in mahogany.
translation.de: Wir sollten alles aus Mahagoni haben.

translation.en: Mahogany? No. Why?
It'd help Christmas cheer if no one was eaten by a snow monster.
translation.de: Wäre schön, wenn niemand von Schneemonstern gefressen würde.

translation.en: These reforms will take an upfront investment.
What's your cash on hand? Fifty trillion hollyberries.
translation.de: -Wie viel Geld habt ihr? -50 Billionen Stachelbeeren.

translation.en: -In dollars? -Seven.
Okay, we need to raise revenue.
What do you charge to get on the nice list?
translation.de: Wie viel, um zu den Artigen zu gehören?

translation.en: The only charge is being the best you can-- [Boss Baby] Honk, honk.
translation.de: Man muss nur sein Bestes geben…

translation.en: You sillies are practically feeding cash to the reindeer.
translation.de: Ihr Trottel verfüttert praktisch Geld an die Rentiere.

translation.en: But it's always been free.
And your boss always wears a red suit to a home invasion.
translation.de: Und euer Boss trägt immer einen roten Anzug.

translation.en: Tradition's a dumb reason to do anything.
You're running a business that's stalled out below its potential.
translation.de: Euer Betrieb stagniert unter seinem Potenzial.

translation.en: It's killing my soul.
But good news?
You've got me.
The portal.
What? Yes. Hurry up, let's go.
Unmade toys, Dongle is coming.
No.
You had to stop at the snack cart?
I'm pulling double duty.
I have to rescue my brother and keep my family traditions from dying.
translation.de: Ich muss meinen Bruder und meine Familientraditionen retten.

translation.en: Stop being so dramatic. There has to be a simple solution.
translation.de: Mach kein Drama. Es gibt sicher eine einfache Lösung.

translation.en: Four plane tickets to the North Pole.
Great. Does anyone have $11,000?
I have 700 hollyberries.
I had to buy a winter hat.
I only have 10K five hunny.
So close.
Look, super speedy delivery.
"Santa letters and packages delivered to the North Pole before midnight"?
translation.de: "Briefe und Pakete zum Nordpol, Zustellung vor Mitternacht"?

translation.en: We follow the next delivery truck to the airport,
translation.de: Wir folgen dem nächsten Lieferwagen zum Flugzeug

translation.en: sneak on a jet disguised as food-service workers.
When the crew asks, "Is that low-fat?"
I go, "No, it's high fist."
Double thumpers into a roundhouse kick.
We've put two on the ground, because I'm good at kicking.
translation.de: Zwei sind am Boden, denn Kicks habe ich drauf.

translation.en: But we can't control the cockpit until we defeat six crooked co-pilots,
translation.de: Aber wir müssen sechs Kopiloten besiegen,

translation.en: each trained in a deadly martial art.
translation.de: die alle eine tödliche Kampfkunst beherrschen.

translation.en: My plan was better.
Oh! Watch your elbows, Jimbo.
[Tim] Dongle, don't eat all my snacks.
-[Dongle] Dongle is not eating anything. -[chewing]
I hear little Chloe is on the naughty list...
What's it worth to you to get Josie into nice?
translation.de: Wie viel, damit Josie zu den Artigen kommt?

translation.en: Start Scooter on the $50 nice package...
Isn't everything more beautiful when it's profitable?
This makes me feel yucky,
translation.de: Ich fühl mich so eklig dabei

translation.en: like a sticky candy cane that fell on a floor.
translation.de: wie eine klebrige Zuckerstange, die am Boden liegt.

translation.en: Remember, you're helping to finance more efficient toy-making.
translation.de: Du unterstützt die Finanzierung einer effizienten Spielzeugherstellung.

translation.en: Things are looking up for your compensation.
We're gonna get more Christmas cheer?
-You get paid in Christmas cheer? -I wish.
We get paid in twinkly smiles,
which can be exchanged for Christmas cheer.
translation.de: die wir in Weihnachtsfreude umtauschen können.

translation.en: You have to trade in at the Santa shop.
They're only open for a half-hour on Thursdays.
translation.de: Der hat donnerstags eine halbe Stunde geöffnet.

translation.en: Unless you send your smiles by penguin messenger, which takes months.
translation.de: Oder man schickt sein Lächeln mit dem Pinguinboten, dauert Monate.

translation.en: What kind of hustle is Santa running on you?
We love Santa. We're like a family business.
translation.de: Wir lieben ihn. Wir sind ein Familienbetrieb.

translation.en: Are you? I know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen.
translation.de: Ach? Ich kenne Dasher, Dancer, Prancer und Vixen.

translation.en: All the reindeer do for 364 days a year is eat grass and poop.
translation.de: 364 Tage fressen und kacken die Rentiere nur.

translation.en: You elves do all the work, and I couldn't name one of you.
translation.de: Ihr Elfen macht alles und ich kenne eure Namen nicht.

translation.en: Except you, DookiePoops.
-PoopyDoopy. -Forget how things have always been done.
What do you deserve right now?
I would like a little recognition.
[all] Yeah.
-Right. -We should talk to Santa.
[man 1] Last delivery for the season.
[man 2] Put it there, right next to the gigantic pile of letters.
translation.de: Stell sie dahin, neben den großen Haufen Briefe.

translation.en: -[man 1] Merry Chri-- -[door closes]
We're here. Good. Dongle is hungry.
Even though Dongle did not eat the snacks.
translation.de: Obwohl Dongle die Snacks nicht gegessen hat.

translation.en: Uh, you aren't letters to Santa. I'm disappointed.
translation.de: Ihr seid keine Briefe. Ich bin enttäuscht.

translation.en: But I like feeling disappointed, so mixed bag.
translation.de: Aber ich bin gern enttäuscht, also egal.

translation.en: Remove your funeral suit, sad vampire.
Dongle is here.
Is this the North Pole?
"North Pole." Yay, we're here.
[Tim] It says "Noth Pole." You left out the R.
At least I didn't write it backwards. We could've ended up in Elop Htron.
translation.de: Aber ich hab's nicht rückwärts geschrieben. Wir hätten am Lopdron enden können.

translation.en: This is the Noth Pole?
I'm the Noth Pole. That's my name.
translation.de: Ich bin der Nodpol. So heiße ich.

translation.en: I changed it so all the letters to Santa with that misspelled word come to me.
translation.de: Ich änderte ihn, damit alle Briefe, wo das Wort falsch geschrieben wurde, an mich gehen.

translation.en: It's thrilling.
That's a weird thing to be excited about.
translation.de: Komisch, so etwas aufregend zu finden.

translation.en: Why? This is a pile of hopes and dreams
I can sell to collectors for a lot of money.
translation.de: für diesen Haufen Hoffnungen und Träume.

translation.en: We need to get to the North Pole. And quick. Is that possible?
translation.de: Wir müssen zum Nordpol. Schnell. Ist das möglich?

translation.en: It's a 30-minute chartered jet ride.
I can make anything happen. I'm Noth Pole.
translation.de: Ich kann alles einfädeln. Ich bin Nodpol.

translation.en: -Yay. -[Noth] But I won't.
I don't really feel like it. Don't touch my pile.
translation.de: Ich hab keine Lust. Nicht anfassen.

translation.en: Dongle touched nothing.
These letters go for a fortune in Tokyo, along with gum chewed by politicians,
translation.de: Die Briefe sind in Tokio ein Vermögen wert, genau wie von Politikern gekaute Kaugummis,

translation.en: industrial blueprints from mobile home manufacturers...
What happens with the kids who wrote the letters?
translation.de: Und die Kinder, die sie schrieben?

translation.en: They just don't get what they want for Christmas.
translation.de: Die kriegen eben nicht, was sie sich wünschen.

translation.en: What? That's horrible.
No, I think you missed it. I get money.
translation.de: Nein, du verstehst das nicht. Ich bekomme Geld.

translation.en: Making money off of Christmas? That's crazy.
translation.de: Du verdienst mit Weihnachten Geld? Verrückt.

translation.en: Thank you, boy.
Your shouted words have inspired me to change--
Yay, it's a Christmas miracle.
--my business model.
When Santa doesn't deliver and children weep, parents will do anything to get them their toys,
translation.de: Weinen Kinder, tun Eltern alles, damit sie ihr Spielzeug kriegen.

translation.en: even buy them from me at a huge markup.
translation.de: Sie kaufen es sogar mir mit Aufschlag ab.

translation.en: Don't you use my ideas for evil.
translation.de: Benutze meine Ideen nicht für Böses.

translation.en: You turned my letters into a nutcracker in ten seconds?
translation.de: Kannst du aus den Briefen Nussknacker machen?

translation.en: -No. -[Noth] No, him.
Five seconds.
Ten is for lazy toymakers who are not Dongle.
translation.de: Länger ist für faule Spielzeugmacher, nicht für Dongle.

translation.en: I like his style. I've devised a deal.
translation.de: Ich mag seine Art. Wie wär's mit einem Deal?

translation.en: I'll charter that flight,
but Dongle stays with me to make 10,000 toys for profit.
translation.de: aber Dongle bleibt hier und hilft mir, Spielzeug zu machen.

translation.en: No, we're not leaving Dongle.
Go save your brother with the handsome face
that would look better in glasses.
Dongle will catch up.
-You sure? -Merry Christmas.
You press that button, Dongle will get you out of any jam.
translation.de: Drück den Knopf und Dongle hilft dir aus der Patsche.

translation.en: Mostly toy-building jams. That is where the button is of most use.
-Thank you, Dongle. -Okay, this hug is done.
I'm going to the North Pole. How do you handle the excitement of being at the real North Pole?
translation.de: Ich geh zum Nordpol. Wie kommst du mit der Aufregung klar?

translation.en: You don't.
It looks like Baby Corp.
[Jimbo] But Christmas-ier.
Let's go over the plan. Me and Tim look for Boss.
I'll find what they're using to jam our chupie transport tech, and smash it.
translation.de: Ich finde raus, wieso die Schnullertransporttechnologie klemmt und hau drauf.

translation.en: Got that, Tim?
I'm at the North Pole.
Can you keep it together? No.
I'm actually in Santa Town. I'm gonna...
Um, hello?
Anyone home?
Anyone making toys?
Anyone Santa?
It's gingerbread.
Jimbo. Don't eat the toy factory--
Dang, break me off some of that wall.
translation.de: Ach, brich mir auch was von der Wand ab.

translation.en: Stop chewing. I hear actual North Pole Christmas Cheer.
translation.de: Hört auf zu kauen. Ich höre Weihnachtsfreude.

translation.en: Then Santa said, "Thanks, Tippy Tappy Slappy."
But I'm not Tippy Tappy Slappy. I'm Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.de: Aber ich bin nicht Tippy Tappy Slappy. Ich bin Tippy Tappy Sloppy.

translation.en: Ugh. Breaks my heart.
Who's got another complaint about Santa's mismanagement?
translation.de: Noch mehr Beschwerden über Santas Misswirtschaft?

translation.en: There's the boss. Hi.
We should have suggestion boxes, but we don't.
So how do we suggest we get one?
What did you do?
Uh, good to see you too.
Where's the fun and jolly toy making? This is Santa's factory.
translation.de: Wo ist die Freude? Das ist Santas Fabrik.

translation.en: Really? It's Santa who clocks in? Santa who carves the horsies?
translation.de: Echt? Stempelt Santa denn? Schnitzt er die Pferdchen?

translation.en: Santa spring-loading jack-in-the-boxes?
translation.de: Baut er Federn in Springteufel ein?

translation.en: You're messing with Christmas.
It's a mess. I'm cleaning it up.
translation.de: Es war Chaos. Ich räume auf.

translation.en: Christmas is perfect. Everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.de: Es ist perfekt. Alle lieben Santa und seine Elfen.

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
We're trying to recall Santa's nicknames, but couldn't remember.
translation.de: Wir versuchen, uns an Santas Spitznamen zu erinnern.

translation.en: Can you help us?
Sure, Santa, Santa Clause, St. Nick, Kriss Kringle, Father Christmas--
translation.de: Santa, Nikolaus, St. Nick, Kriss Kringle, Weihnachtsmann…

translation.en: Cool, cool.
-Now name an elf. -What?
You said, everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.de: Du sagtest, alle lieben Santa und seine Elfen.

translation.en: You know every single one of Santa's nicknames.
translation.de: Du kennst jeden Spitznamen von Santa.

translation.en: Surely you know just one of our names.
translation.de: Du kennst sicher auch unsere Namen.

translation.en: Blitzen? Blitzen?
Kid's confusing us with those antlered stink horses?
translation.de: Du verwechselst uns mit geweihtragenden Pferden?

translation.en: You done did it now.
[PoopyDoopy] I'm done being a cog in the Christmas wheel.
translation.de: Ich will kein namenloser Arbeiter sein.

translation.en: A wheel we probably made.
[shouts] Santa's factory? Ha!
This is our factory.
[elves] Yeah!
How long have you been-- What did you hear?
translation.de: Wie lange… Was hast du gehört?

translation.en: Enough.
All I wanted was to make everyone happy.
translation.de: Ich wollte nur alle glücklich machen.

translation.en: Well, you sure blew that.
Yeah.
[elf] We should get better than this.
You're right.
I hope I can do better next year.
translation.de: Hoffentlich bin ich nächstes Jahr besser.

translation.en: -[elves gasping] -[PoopyDoopy] Not the naughty list.
Santa.
There he is. On his sleigh.
translation.de: Da ist er. Auf seinem Schlitten.

translation.en: -I can't believe it. -I know.
He teleported to a sleigh that would take two minutes to walk to.
translation.de: Er teleportierte zum Schlitten, der zwei Minuten weg war.

translation.en: Explains the, uh... [grunts]
No, I can't believe he's gone.
Santa can't go on the naughty list. He's Santa.
translation.de: Er darf nicht auf die Unartigen-Liste. Er ist Santa.

translation.en: Why does it feel like a man cave on Mother's Day?
A re-org like this usually takes weeks.
We should be celebrating.
Yeah, get it.
We had a misunderstanding.
Got the chupies working. Let's jet.
Look at that. Still time to play fruitcake lacrosse.
translation.de: Also noch genug Zeit fürs Früchtebrot-Lacrosse.

translation.en: -Hockey. -One of those boarding school sports.
What about Santa? What happens with Christmas?
These elves got it covered.
Uh... Not really.
This was about recognition for making toys.
translation.de: Es ging um Anerkennung fürs Spielzeugmachen.

translation.en: Delivering them is Santa's thing. Because, you know, the sleigh.
translation.de: Die Lieferung ist Santas Aufgabe. Wegen des Schlittens.

translation.en: This isn't a Santa problem. It's a logistics problem.
translation.de: Ist kein Santa-Problem, sondern ein logistisches.

translation.en: Call in the paper pushers.
Simmons, Hendershot. On my location.
Is this the secret Christmas Party? Bring on the nog.
translation.de: Ist das die geheime Weihnachtsfeier? Eierlikör her!

translation.en: -[both chanting] Nog, nog, nog-- -I got something better than nog.
We're gonna solve Christmas toy delivery logistics.
translation.de: Wir werden die Logistik der Spielzeuglieferung lösen.

translation.en: One fire dog, coming up.
This stump taken?
Santa? Why are you--?
Is this about the naughty list?
That snowball to the kisser should've sealed the deal.
No one is questioning your naughtiness, or mine.
translation.de: Keiner stellt deine Unartigkeit infrage oder meine.

translation.en: Whoa, you finally made the jump?
translation.de: Wow, du hast endlich den Sprung gewagt?

translation.en: Danny, you've been on my naughty list since you were old enough to pass gas at will.
translation.de: Danny, du bist unartig, seit du alt genug bist, um zu furzen.

translation.en: Continue. I joined the list 20 minutes ago, and I feel like crud.
translation.de: -Weiter. -Ich stehe erst 20 Minuten auf der Liste.

translation.en: But here you are, happy as a clam, roasting hot dogs on a fire--
translation.de: Du bist fröhlich und brätst Würste…

translation.en: Is that last year's bundle of coal?
translation.de: Ist das Kohle vom letzten Jahr?

translation.en: Doesn't that taste like--
Oh, yeah.
So how do we live with ourselves when we've been so naughty?
translation.de: Wie können wir mit uns selbst leben, wenn wir unartig sind?

translation.en: Papa Noel, I'm glad you asked.
translation.de: Papa Noel, gut, dass du fragst.

translation.en: First get rid of this idea that naughtiness is bad.
translation.de: Zuerst einmal: Unartig ist nicht schlecht.

translation.en: Naughty living is very healthy and very normal.
translation.de: Unartigkeit ist sehr gesund und ganz normal.

translation.en: What? You just...
Got my veggies in the naughtiest way.
translation.de: Ich besorge mir mein Gemüse auf unartige Art.

translation.en: Nice needs naughtiness like night needs day
translation.de: Artig braucht unartig wie die Nacht den Tag

translation.en: and turtles need shells to hide their eyes during scary movies.
Give a naughty man a hotdog, he'll have a hotdog.
translation.de: Gib einem Unartigen einen Hotdog und er isst einen Hotdog.

translation.en: But teach a naughty man to hotdog, and he'll have a ton of hotdogs.
translation.de: Aber zeige ihm, wie man Hotdogs holt, und er isst viele Hotdogs.

translation.en: [man] My ear lobe.
Don't forget, every Christmas morning,
translation.de: Jedes Weihnachten bekommen unartige Kinder Kohlen,

translation.en: naughty kids wake up to coal, which is dead dinosaurs.
translation.de: Jedes Weihnachten bekommen unartige Kinder Kohlen, was tote Dinosaurier sind.

translation.en: So while nice kids play with toys...
...we're playing with dead dinosaurs. And that's rad.
translation.de: und wir mit toten Dinosauriern. Und das ist irre.

translation.en: [Tippy Tappy Sloppy] Approaching target. Open flaps.
Opening flaps.
And release.
Yes, Templeton?
What makes you think you can do Christmas without Santa?
translation.de: Wie kommst du darauf, dass du Santa nicht brauchst?

translation.en: Uh, the fact that we are.
Let's get industrial fans, make sure she can handle monsoons in the South Pacific.
translation.de: Ich bin sicher, sie kommt mit Monsunen überm Südpazifik klar.

translation.en: This isn't the same. You need magic and wonder.
translation.de: Aber was ist mit Zauber und Wunder?

translation.en: Or Christmas is just a bonus birthday with a tree.
translation.de: Ohne ist Weihnachten nur ein Geburtstag mit Baum.

translation.en: Yes, but you will get a lot of toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
There's more to Christmas than toys.
It's how awesome it is to see boot marks on snowy roofs.
-See if we can fake boot marks. -On it.
It's seeing Santa's cookies gone, except a half-eaten one.
translation.de: Sehen, dass Santas Kekse weg sind, bis auf einen angebissenen.

translation.en: Kids pick it up like, "Santa's teeth touched this."
translation.de: Kinder denken: "Santas Zähne haben den berührt."

translation.en: You're holding on to Christmas past. This is Christmas future.
translation.de: Das war mal so. Jetzt kommt das Weihnachten der Zukunft.

translation.en: Satisfaction guaranteed.
All sales final.
Ha. Silly Gingergoose.
Hello, animal that is not a dog.
translation.de: Hallo, Tier, das kein Hund ist.

translation.en: Dongle, where have you been?
The usual. Living the most incredible life.
Who's your friend?
My chisel is my friend. My sander is my confidant.
translation.de: Mein Meißel ist mein Freund und meine Schleifmaschine.

translation.en: This one gave me a ride. We are not friends.
We're also not enemies. We're next to each other.
translation.de: Auch keine Feinde. Wir sind einfach nur nebeneinander.

translation.en: -Any more questions? -Yeah, where are my hollyberries?
No more questions from you. But one from Dongle.
translation.de: Keine Fragen mehr von dir. Aber eine von Dongle.

translation.en: Where is the big man?
This is all wrong.
Your fellow elves fighting for recognition is wrong?
translation.de: Dass deine Elfenkollegen Anerkennung wollen, ist falsch?

translation.en: No, if anyone loves recognition, it's Dongle.
translation.de: Nein, Dongle bekommt auch gerne Anerkennung.

translation.en: You are Dongle.
I recognize you.
Santa does more than bring toys Dongle makes.
translation.de: Santa tut viel mehr, als Spielzeug ausliefern.

translation.en: He brings people together, makes people feel good.
translation.de: Er bringt Menschen zusammen und macht sie glücklich.

translation.en: Told you.
The world is changing. It's time Christmas catches up.
translation.de: Die Welt ändert sich. Wird Zeit, dass Weihnachten aufholt.

translation.en: How you sleep at night? Guilt won't work on me.
Does Dongle look like a disappointed grandmother?
translation.de: Sieht Dongle aus wie eine enttäuschte Oma?

translation.en: Simple question. How you go to sleep?
translation.de: Einfache Frage. Wie kannst du schlafen?

translation.en: Like every hardworking baby American.
Tucked into a firm swaddle with a belly full of milk
translation.de: Eingewickelt in eine Decke, einem Bauch voll Milch

translation.en: and a night-night kiss from Mommy and/or Daddy.
translation.de: Eingewickelt in eine Decke, einem Bauch voll Milch und einem Gutenachtkuss.

translation.en: Night-night kiss is unnecessary, no?
You are tired, full, swaddled. You fall asleep no matter what.
translation.de: Du bist müde, satt, eingewickelt. Du schläfst ein.

translation.en: I don't need the kiss, but I like--
Oh, you led me right into that.
Christmas without Santa is like bedtime without night-night kiss.
translation.de: Weihnachten ohne Santa ist wie Bettzeit ohne Gutenachtkuss.

translation.en: No one wants that.
Fine, you're all big elves. You want Santa back? Go get him.
translation.de: Ihr wollt Santa zurück? Holt ihn euch.

translation.en: No, you go.
No chance. Why me?
Because from what you tell Dongle, the Christmas man, he left in bad shape.
translation.de: Der Weihnachtsmann war anscheinend in schlechter Verfassung.

translation.en: Hollow on the inside, like a grocery store chocolate nutcracker.
He asks himself, "Who am I anymore?"
translation.de: Er fragt sich: "Wer bin ich überhaupt noch?"

translation.en: [Dongle] You break a Santa, you got to fix a Santa.
translation.de: Zerbrichst du Santa, musst du ihn reparieren.

translation.en: -When you break a Santa this bad, -[snoring]
only one thing can put his heart back together:
translation.de: hilft nur eins, um es wieder zu heilen:

translation.en: Seeing a bah-humbug stinker like you find the Christmas spirit.
translation.de: Zu sehen, wie ein Weihnachtsmuffel wie du die Weihnachtsfreude findet.

translation.en: You will go get Santa. And what happens if I don't?
Singing.
-Excuse me? -Hit it.
♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
Ooh. Catchy hook.
Yeah, throw in some verses and a bridge,
I bet we could get the whole world singing this.
translation.de: könnten wir alle dazu bringen, das zu singen.

translation.en: Please, don't.
[Diddly Doo] ♪ He came to the North Pole And started fussing ♪
translation.de: Er kam zum Nordpol Und jammerte rum

translation.en: ♪ Made Santa cry With all his cussing ♪
[Lala] ♪ He took Father Christmas All sweet and loved ♪
♪ And showed him just where He could shove it ♪
translation.de: Wohin er es sich stecken kann

translation.en: [both] ♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪ ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.de: Das Baby, das Weihnachten ruinierte Das Baby, das Weihnachten ruinierte

translation.en: This song makes me wanna dance.
And get rid of our Christmas-ruining baby.
translation.de: Und unser Weihnachten ruinierendes Baby loswerden.

translation.en: [Diddly Doo] ♪ On Christmas morn All the kids did weep ♪
♪ For not a single toy Lay beneath their feet ♪
[both] ♪ And just in case you forgot his name ♪
translation.de: Und falls ihr seinen Namen vergaßt

translation.en: ♪ The baby who we all should blame ♪
translation.de: Das Baby, das an allem schuld ist

translation.en: ♪ Theodore Leslie Templeton ♪
♪ Shame, shame, shame ♪
♪ Christmas burned down ♪
♪ And he lit the flame ♪
I love this song and hate this baby.
♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
Fine.
Promise me that song never leaves this room, and I'll go get him.
translation.de: Versprecht, dass dieses Lied nie diesen Raum verlässt.

translation.en: But we still have a problem.
I'd get him, but I don't know where he is.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wo Santa ist.

translation.en: [Noth] I can find him. I'm the Noth Pole.
translation.de: Ich kann ihn finden. Ich bin der Nodpol.

translation.en: He gives me creepy motel check-in vibes.
Can you really find Santa?
Yes, for a price.
I want the letters to Santa.
translation.de: Ich will die Briefe an Santa.

translation.en: -All of them. -[Tim] No way.
Santa needs those to know what every kid wants.
translation.de: Wie weiß Santa dann, was die Kinder wollen?

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing children's letters.
translation.de: Ich würde ja helfen, aber ich lerne Briefe auswendig.

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.de: Ich würde ja helfen, aber ich lerne Briefe auswendig. Sonst brauche ich Wochen, um die Geschenke auszuliefern.

translation.en: Deal. You can have every letter.
[all] What?
That's it. Every letter.
We did our part. You do yours.
The smiling red one lurks at the mall in your hometown.
translation.de: Der lächelnde rote Mann lauert in der Mall deiner Heimatstadt.

translation.en: I'll remember none of you.
translation.de: Ich werde mich an keinen erinnern.

translation.en: -[shouts] -Go.
I can't help it. One more time. Two, three, four.
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪ ♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.de: Das Baby, das Weihnachten ruinierte Das Baby, das Weihnachten ruinierte

translation.en: You here?
Yo, Ronny.
[groans] Santa?
Time to go.
But if someone like you would come for me,
translation.de: Aber wenn jemand wie du mich holt,

translation.en: it's never too late to change things.
translation.de: ist es nie zu spät, was zu ändern.

translation.en: There's no amount of naughtiness the Christmas spirit can't--
translation.de: Es gibt nicht so viel Unartigkeit, dass die Weihn…

translation.en: Gonna cut you off before you embarrass yourself worse than that outfit does.
translation.de: Ich unterbreche lieber, ehe du dich blamierst.

translation.en: I'm only here because if I don't bring you back,
translation.de: Ich muss dich heimbringen, sonst beschmutzen mich

translation.en: two pint-size hitmakers are gonna smear my good name all over the Top 40.
translation.de: Ich muss dich heimbringen, sonst beschmutzen mich -zwei Hitmacher in der Top 40. -Diddly Doo und Lala Doo-Da?

translation.en: Diddly Doo and Lala Doo-Da?
translation.de: -zwei Hitmacher in der Top 40. -Diddly Doo und Lala Doo-Da?

translation.en: I thought the elves were all mad at me because of how naughty I've been.
translation.de: Sind nicht alle wütend, weil ich so unartig war?

translation.en: You're not naughty,
just stuck in your ways, and grossly inefficient.
What do you pay in reindeer maintenance for one night of use? Can't you lease?
translation.de: Was zahlst du jährlich an Rentierwartung? Kannst du sie nicht mieten?

translation.en: But for reasons beyond me, the elves want you back for Christmas.
translation.de: Weiß nicht warum, aber die Elfen wollen dich zurückhaben.

translation.en: -And what about you? -What?
What do you want for Christmas?
translation.de: Was wünschst du dir zu Weihnachten?

translation.en: No.
No.
Hey, I'm stuck in my ways.
You want something from Santa? Ask. I don't make the rules.
translation.de: Willst du was von Santa? Frag. Ich mach die Regeln nicht.

translation.en: You absolutely make the...
[groans] Fine.
I got it. I got it.
-Come back to the North Pole. -What, little boy?
[yelling] I'd like you to come back to the North Pole.
translation.de: Ich wünsche mir, dass du zum Nordpol zurückkehrst!

translation.en: Santa can do that for you.
I think we just had a Christmas spirit breakthrough.
translation.de: Das war ein Durchbruch in der Weihnachtsstimmung.

translation.en: Is this what it feels like?
I also want a tie clip, a gold one with wings on it.
And one of those electric shoe polishers you see in golf club locker rooms.
translation.de: Und eine Schuhputzmaschine, wie in den Golfclubs.

translation.en: And gift cards. They're tacky, but it's like plastic money.
translation.de: Und Geschenkkarten. Die sind wie Plastikgeld.

translation.en: That's what the Christmas spirit is.
Asking for things you don't need and don't have time to get.
translation.de: Um Dinge bitten, die man nicht braucht.

translation.en: -No. -Well, hey, you tried.
You have the worst catchphrase.
Yeah? What's yours?
Oh. I was trying to make "fart poop doody" work, but...
translation.de: Ich hab's mit "Furz, Pups, Kacka" versucht…

translation.en: [groans] Do your dumb laugh.
You've been busy. Santa, I'm sorry.
It was everyone else who messed with all the stuff--
-I like it. -I helped.
Dongle. It's jolly to see you.
Dongle is a comforting presence.
A gift from all of us.
But don't worry, Dongle made it.
A Baby Corp monitor? Um--
Press the talky button.
I'm Baby Corp.
I'm incompetent.
First rule of business, I'm dumb.
Second rule, I forgot, because I'm dumb.
translation.de: Zweite Regel hab ich vergessen, weil ich dumm bin.

translation.en: Look at the bottom.
[Santa] "Dongle"?
We put our names on everything,
translation.de: Wir drucken unsere Namen auf alles,

translation.en: so the children know why they weep with joy when they get a Dongle toy.
translation.de: damit die Kinder vor Freude weinen, wenn sie was von Dongle kriegen.

translation.en: It's not the way things have always been done, but...
translation.de: Es ist nicht die Art, wie die Dinge immer gemacht wurden…

translation.en: If the way things are always done leaves people unhappy, who needs it?
translation.de: Wenn diese Art aber Menschen unglücklich macht, wer braucht sie dann?

translation.en: It's perfect. I'm sorry I didn't think of this years ago.
translation.de: Ja. Daran hätte ich schon vor Jahren denken sollen.

translation.en: Anyone know if this is edible?
It's that late?
[Jimbo] It's not edible.
We don't have time. What have I done?
I'll never get the presents out tonight.
Is this guy's name Santa or Can't-a?
Efficiency, Ron. Still got those gifts memorized?
translation.de: Effizienz, Ron. Weißt du die Geschenke noch auswendig?

translation.en: Do I? TWCAFIJ.
Tim Wants Canadian Action Figure in Jacuzzi.
translation.de: Tim will kanadische Actionfigur im Whirlpool.

translation.en: He's got them. -Yeah! -[elves cheering]
Elves, Baby Corp,
let's Christmas.
-Like "let's do this" but-- -We got it. We just don't like it.
-[shouts] -Let's Christmas.
-Yeah! -[all cheering]
Release.
-Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
I'd like your most expensive pinky ring.
translation.de: Ich hätte gern Ihren teuersten Ring.

translation.en: Let's just say I've got enough letters
translation.de: Ich habe genug Briefe, um Warenautomaten von Miyazaki bis Hokkaido zu füllen.

translation.en: to fill vending machines from Miyazaki to Hokkaido.
translation.de: um Warenautomaten von Miyazaki bis Hokkaido zu füllen.

translation.en: What?
No, no, no.
[Tim] Dear Noth, stop selling letters.
translation.de: Lieber Nod, verkauf keine Briefe mehr.

translation.en: It's not nice.
Here's a present, anyway. Love, Tim.
translation.de: Hier ist trotzdem ein Geschenk. Tim.

translation.en: The scary broken toy I wanted as a kid, but never got.
translation.de: Der gruselige kaputte Hampelmann, den ich nie bekam.

translation.en: It's Kyle.
[girl 1] A ten-speed bicycle from Ding Dong Dongle, and it's made from wood.
translation.de: Ein Zehngangfahrrad aus Holz von Ding Dong Dongle.

translation.en: [girl 2 in French] Jingly Jangly made my teddy bear.
translation.de: Jingly Jangly hat meinen Teddy gemacht.

translation.en: [boy] A baseball mitt.
And Tippy Tappy Sloppy the Elf made it.
translation.de: Tippy Tappy Sloppy hat ihn gemacht.

translation.en: Lucky the kids got Mom's genetics, because Dad is a pile of yikes.
translation.de: Gut, dass die Kids Moms Gene haben, Dads sind eher peinlich.

translation.en: [boy] Santa?
-[paper ripping] -[gasps] A yo-yo.
Made by PoopyDoopy the Elf?
Thank you, Santa and PoopyDoopy.
I love it, and promise to share with everyone.
translation.de: So schön und ich werde ihn mit allen teilen.

translation.en: How do we get past the kid?
-You sick St. Nick. -[boy snoring]
I can't believe I delivered presents with Santa.
translation.de: Ich lieferte mit Santa Geschenke aus.

translation.en: Every last one.
Free of charge.
Oh, please, I helped. Doesn't mean I'll dump my portfolio and move to a commune.
translation.de: Ich half mit. Deshalb werfe ich aber nicht mein Portfolio weg.

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
Merry Christmas.
So, what lame teachable gift that sums up this whole experience do you have for me?
translation.de: Welches lehrreiche Geschenk hast du für mich zum Abschluss?

translation.en: Hello?
Nothing?
Don't you want me to get the Christmas spir--? Ow!
translation.de: Soll ich denn nicht die Weihnach…?

translation.en: They call me MC Christmas.
The C also stands for Christmas.
-Ted, it's Christmas morning. -What?
We forgot to make snack leis. We'll starve during fruitcake hockey.
translation.de: Wir haben die Snack-Leis fürs Früchtebrot-Hockey vergessen.

translation.en: We'll ruin our sweet little guy's first traditional Templeton Christmas.
translation.de: Wir ruinieren das erste traditionelle Templeton-Weihnachten für den Kleinen.

translation.en: What if he isn't into the traditional Templeton Christmas?
translation.de: Was, wenn er das gar nicht so mag?

translation.en: They're family traditions. Our family's different now.
If the way we always do things makes one of us unhappy,
translation.de: Wenn unsere Traditionen einen von uns unglücklich machen,

translation.en: let's do different things.
-I could come up with new ideas. -Family brainstorm.
What are fun words that rhyme with "wreath"?
Santa gave me snack leis, so this tradition is back on.
[both] Fruitcake hockey in the driveway.
-We'll get the sticks. -Wrap the baby in sofa cushions.
Your mom plays violent.
I'll talk them out of that.
You don't have to throw out every tradition for me.
translation.de: Ihr müsst nicht jede Tradition aufgeben.

translation.en: You'll do fruitcake hockey and snack leis?
This wearable choking hazard? No.
But I'll play your holiday dessert Canadian stick game.
translation.de: Aber ich spiele euer kanadisches Stock-Spiel mit.

translation.en: -You will? -It's nonsense.
But it can't be all bad if it brings people together, and gets you all smiley.
translation.de: Aber es bringt Menschen zusammen und macht sie glücklich.

translation.en: Just like Santa.
I guess. I mean, if you squint and don't think about it--
translation.de: Na ja, wenn man blinzelt und nicht nachdenkt…

translation.en: No. Feeling Christmas spirit. [shouts]
[Tim] Goal!
[Danny gasps] I got a sock full of dead dinosaurs.
Merry Christmas to all.
The end.
That was in no way a "make us fall asleep" story.
-I have so many questions. -Yeah.
Wasn't your setup about why we should do goofy traditions even if we don't want to?
translation.de: Wir sollen alberne Traditionen pflegen, auch wenn wir nicht wollen.

translation.en: You bailed on that with your brother.
-Then he did some, but not others. -What's the takeaway?
translation.de: -Der machte nur manchmal mit. -Was lernen wir daraus?

translation.en: Want easy lessons? Go to kindergarten.
-[Tina] Can I? -Not until you're 5. Go to sleep.
-Five? -How?
You opened a Pandora's box of moral ambiguity.
Can we go to the zoo if I don't make fun of the capybaras?
translation.de: Können wir in den Zoo gehen?

translation.en: You grew up big and weird.
translation.de: Du bist groß und sonderbar geworden.

translation.en: Okay, all done. Dongle kill kids.
Very funny.
Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice--
translation.de: Wer zweimal auf den gleichen Trick…

translation.en: Dongle is serious. The big one deserved it. She stopped feeding the Christmas Panda and it died.
translation.de: Nein. Die Große hat's verdient. Ihretwegen starb der Weihnachtspanda.

translation.en: What?
Dongle tricked you again for drama.
translation.de: Dongle hat dich ausgetrickst für Drama.

translation.en: You are welcome for the spice of life.
Merry Christmas.
[adult Tim] Merry Christmas.
